reasoning:

- Boss Blind: Will need around 1600 chips but with special conditions

Since I can't purchase anything with my current funds, I should move forward to the next blind. I'll gain money from interest on my $2 and $1 per remaining hand after beating the blind. My flush synergies are strong enough to handle the Big Blind comfortably, so proceeding to round_select is the right call.

I've confirmed there's no other viable optionâ€”cards are too expensive, rerolling costs $5, and selling a joker would only give me $4 total while compromising my strategy since both jokers activate on the same flush condition.
